1 // ~~~~~~~~ Widget catalog
  2 
  3 // TODO: Remove refs to "myportal"
  4 
  5 (function($){
  6 
  7 if(typeof console === "undefined") {
  8     console = { log: function() { } };
  9 }
 10 
 11 var Events = capsule.Events;
 12 
 13 function Catalog(selector, settings) {
 14     this.options = $.extend({
 15         user: null,
 16         admin: false
 17     }, settings);
 18     this.elt = $(selector).addClass("capsule-library");
 19     this.widgetsPagination = 0;
 20     this.categories = [];
 21 
 22     this.categoriesElt = $("<div></div>").addClass("capsule-library-categories")
 23         .append($("<ul></ul>").addClass("categories"))
 24         .appendTo(this.elt);
 25     this.widgetsElt = $("<div></div>").attr("class", "capsule-library-widgets")
 26         .appendTo(this.elt);
 27     this.elt.append($("<div></div>").attr("id", "library-pagination"));
 28 
 29     var self = this;
 30     if (typeof this.options.data == 'string') {
 31         $.getJSON(this.options.data, function(portlets) {
 32             self._build(portlets);
 33         });
 34     } else {
 35         this._build(this.options.data);
 36     }
 37     Events.bind(Events.NEWPORTLET, function(e, data){
 38         self.elt.slideUp();
 39     });
 40 }
 41 
 42 Catalog.prototype = {
 43 
 44     addButton: function(selector) {
 45         var library = this.elt;
 46         $(selector).click((function() {
 47             return function(e, data) {
 48                 if (!library.is(":visible")) {
 49                     var category = $('.capsule-library-category.selected');
 50                     var categoryId;
 51                     if(category[0]) {
 52                         categoryId = parseInt(category[0].id.substring('category-'.length, category[0].id.length), 10);
 53                     }
 54                     if(!myportal.widgetsPagination) {
 55                         $('.capsule-library-widgets').empty();
 56                     }
 57                     library.show(0);
 58                     if(!$('.capsule-library-widget').length) {
 59                         mycatalog.loadWidgets(categoryId ? categoryId : 0); // TODO: Use events
 60                     }
 61                 } else {
 62                     if(data !== undefined && data.doSlide === true ){
 63                         library.slideUp();
 64                     }
 65                     else {
 66                         library.hide();
 67                     }
 68                 }
 69             };
 70         })());
 71     },
 72 
 73     admin: function() {
 74         return this.options.admin;
 75     },
 76 
 77     portal: function() {
 78         return this.options.portal;
 79     },
 80 
 81     _build: function(portlets) {
 82         var catalog = this;
 83         var categories = _(portlets).chain().reduce({}, function(cats, portlet) {
 84             if (cats[portlet.category.id] === undefined) {
 85                 cats[portlet.category.id] = {
 86                     "name": portlet.category.names[catalog.portal().lang()],
 87                     "widgets": []
 88                 };
 89             }
 90             cats[portlet.category.id].widgets.push(portlet);
 91             return cats;
 92         }).values().value();
 93         console.log(categories);
 94         this.categories = categories;
 95 
 96         this.categoriesElt.empty();
 97         var self = this;
 98         for(var i = 0; i < categories.length; i++) {
 99             var name = categories[i].name;
100             if (i18n[name]) name = i18n[name];
101             this.categoriesElt.append(
102                 $("<li></li>")
103                     .attr("id", "category-" + i)
104                     .addClass("capsule-library-category")
105                     .data("catid", i)
106                     .text(name)
107             );
108         }
109         $(".capsule-library-category").click(function(){
110             self.loadWidgets($(this).data("catid"));
111         });
112     },
113 
114     loadWidgets: function(category) {
115         console.log("loading category " + category);
116         if (typeof category !== 'number' || category < 0) {
117             category = 0;
118         }
119         if (this.categories[category]) {
120             this.makeWidgets(this.categories[category].widgets);
121         }
122         $('#category-'+category).addClass('selected');
123         this.showWidgets(0);
124     },
125 
126     showWidgets: function(from) {
127         var catalog = this;
128         if(!this.widgetsPagination) {
129             var successfulComputation = this._computeWidgetsPagination();
130             if(!successfulComputation) {
131                 if(window.console && window.console.log) console.log('cannot compute widgets pagination');
132                 return false;
133             }
134         }
135         if (typeof from !== 'number' || from < 0) from = 0;
136         var widgets = $('.capsule-library-widget');
137         widgets.hide();
138         for(var i = from; i < widgets.length && i < (from + this.widgetsPagination); i++) {
139             $(widgets[i]).fadeIn('slow');
140         }
141         $('#library-pagination').empty();
142         if(widgets.length > this.widgetsPagination) {
143             $("#library-pagination")
144                 .append($("<a></a>").attr("href", "#").addClass("previous").click(function(e){
145                     e.preventDefault();
146                     if (from > 0) {
147                         catalog.portal().showWidgets((from - catalog.widgetsPagination) || 0);
148                     }
149                 })).text("<<")
150                 .append($("<span></span>").text(
151                     from + "-" + (widgets.length < (from + this.widgetsPagination) ? widgets.length : (from + this.widgetsPagination)) + '/' + widgets.length)
152                 )
153                 .append($("<a></a>").attr("href", "#").addClass("next").click(function(){
154                     e.preventDefault();
155                     if(widgets.length > (from + this.widgetsPagination)) {
156                         catalog.portal().showWidgets(from + this.widgetsPagination);
157                     }
158                 }).text(">>"));
159         }
160         return false;
161     },
162 
163     _computeWidgetsPagination: function() {
164         var widget = $('.capsule-library-widget').eq(0);
165         var widgets = this.widgetsElt;
166         var categories = this.categoriesElt;
167 
168         if(widget[0]) {
169             var freeSpace = $('.capsule-library').width() - $('.capsule-library-categories').width() -
170                         (parseInt(widgets.css('margin-left'), 10) || 0) -
171                         (parseInt(widgets.css('margin-right'), 10) || 0) -
172                         (parseInt(categories.css('margin-left'), 10) || 0) -
173                         (parseInt(categories.css('margin-right'), 10) || 0) -
174                         (parseInt(widgets.css('padding-left'), 10) || 0) -
175                         (parseInt(widgets.css('padding-right'), 10) || 0) -
176                         (parseInt(categories.css('padding-left'), 10) || 0) -
177                         (parseInt(categories.css('padding-right'), 10) || 0);
178             var widgetWidth = widget.width() + (parseInt(widget.css('margin-right'), 10) || 0) +
179                         (parseInt(widget.css('margin-left'), 10) || 0) +
180                         (parseInt(widget.css('padding-right'), 10) || 0) +
181                         (parseInt(widget.css('padding-left'), 10) || 0);
182             if(widgetWidth)
183                 this.widgetsPagination = Math.floor(freeSpace / widgetWidth);
184             return this.widgetsPagination ? this.widgetsPagination : false;
185         }
186         return false;
187     },
188 
189     makeWidgets: function(widgets) {
190         $(".capsule-library-category").removeClass('selected');
191         this.widgetsElt.empty();
192         var catalog = this;
193         if (!widgets || typeof widgets.length !== 'number' || widgets.length === 0) {
194             // TODO: When does this hit here? Move message to i18n.
195             this.widgetsElt.append($('<span class="alert">Aucun widget trouvé.</span>'));
196         }
197         $(widgets).each(function() {
198             var url = this.url;
199             var noFeedback = this.noFeedback;
200             var widgetName = this.name;
201             var widget = $("<div></div").addClass("capsule-library-widget")
202                 .append($("<img></img>").addClass("widgetIcon").attr("src", this.icon))
203                 .append($("<span></span>").text(this.name))
204                 .data("widget", this)
205                 .hide()
206                 .appendTo($('.capsule-library-widgets'))
207                 .draggable({ /* Make the widget draggable to the sortable list */
208                     connectToSortable: ".container",
209                     cursor: 'move !important',
210                     helper: function() {
211                         var template = capsule.buildPortletElement(0, catalog.portal(), {
212                                 title: widgetName
213                             })
214                             .addClass(catalog.admin() ? ' admin' : ' user')
215                             .addClass("new-widget-helper ui-sortable-helper");
216                         return template;
217                     },
218                     start: function(e,p){
219                         var total = $(p.helper).parent().css("height");
220                         // Need to refresh sortables, as binding is lost when swapping pages
221                         $(".container").sortable("refresh");
222                     }
223                 }).click(function() {
224                     Events.trigger(Events.NEWPORTLET, {
225                         url: url,
226                         noFeedback: noFeedback,
227                         name: widgetName
228                     });
229                 });
230             });
231         return false;
232     }
233 
234 };
235 
236 if (!window.capsule) window.capsule = {};
237 window.capsule.Catalog = Catalog;
238 
239 })(jQuery);
240
